dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: People think crypto is all about dodging the government, but actually, Kazakhstan is launching a state-backed crypto card project.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People think crypto is all about dodging the government, but actually, Kazakhstan is launching a state-backed crypto card project.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A day earlier, the National Bank of Kazakhstan announced the launch of the crypto card project.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's the National Bank of Kazakhstan that announced it just a day ago. They're really official on this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's the National Bank of Kazakhstan that announced it just a day ago. They're really official on this.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A day earlier, the National Bank of Kazakhstan announced the launch of the crypto card project.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And Minister Zhaslan Madiyev is fully behind it—he said they support it from the very beginning.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Minister Zhaslan Madiyev is fully behind it-he said they support it from the very beginning.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Madiyev, the ministry supports this initiative. We support it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, he mentioned they want to legalize cryptocurrency, open crypto exchanges, even install crypto ATMs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, he mentioned they want to legalize cryptocurrency, open crypto exchanges, even install crypto ATMs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: From the very beginning, we proposed a similar reform: to introduce the issuance of crypto cards, the opening of crypto exchanges, the legalization of cryptocurrency, and the installation of crypto ATMs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which is uh, pretty ambitious. He says it'll help move funds from the unofficial sector to the official one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is uh, pretty ambitious. He says it'll help move funds from the unofficial sector to the official one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: People need access to official crypto-fiat channels so that they can transfer funds from the unofficial sector to the official one, the minister said in the corridors of the Mazhilis.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, so the government can actually track the flow of money in that sphere. That's a big shift in thinking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, so the government can actually track the flow of money in that sphere. That's a big shift in thinking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Madiyev, the initiative will allow the government to track the flow of funds in this sphere and will expand investment tools available to citizens.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But he also warned about diversification—like, you can't just rush into one asset class.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But he also warned about diversification-like, you can't just rush into one asset class.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, one must not forget that diversification is essential. You can't rush headlong into a single asset class or fully switch to one particular currency.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh for sure, he emphasized spreading out risks. The more diversified, the lower the risk, he said.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh for sure, he emphasized spreading out risks. The more diversified, the lower the risk, he said.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Risks should always be spread out. The more diversified the investment portfolio, the lower the risks, he added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And these crypto cards will let people pay with cryptocurrency stored on licensed exchanges at the Astana International Financial Centre.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And these crypto cards will let people pay with cryptocurrency stored on licensed exchanges at the Astana International Financial Centre.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These cards will allow users to make payments using cryptocurrency stored in wallets on licensed crypto exchanges of the Astana International Financial Centre.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which sounds like a safe way to integrate digital assets into everyday payments. It's not just theoretical.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which sounds like a safe way to integrate digital assets into everyday payments. It's not just theoretical.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This solution provides a safe and convenient way to integrate the circulation of digital assets into the existing payment infrastructure, the National Bank's statement said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he framed it as an alternative investment tool for citizens, a way to preserve savings too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he framed it as an alternative investment tool for citizens, a way to preserve savings too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We believe this will provide Kazakhstani citizens with an additional opportunity to invest as an alternative investment tool. It's also a way to preserve the value of their savings, the official noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But honestly, it's still a government is stepping in this directly. Not many countries are doing that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But honestly, it's still a government is stepping in this directly. Not many countries are doing that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True, it's a pretty bold move for a national bank to get involved in crypto cards and infrastructure like that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, it's a pretty bold move for a national bank to get involved in crypto cards and infrastructure like that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I'm curious how quickly we'll see those crypto ATMs he mentioned popping up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm curious how quickly we'll see those crypto ATMs he mentioned popping up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: He did say "in the near future," so maybe sooner than we think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He did say in the near future, so maybe sooner than we think.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I believe we'll see all of this in the near future.
